store/availability-notify.title: This product isn't available right now
store/availability-notify.notify-label: I want to know when this product becomes available
admin/availability-notify.menu.label: Availability Notifier
admin/request.menu.label: Availability Notifier
admin/settings.download-helptext: Download an XLS file with all notify request records.
admin/settings.process-unsent-helptext: Process all unsent requests to notify and download an XLS file of the results.
admin/settings.verify-availability-helpt: Runs a shipping simulation to verify that the item can be shipped to the shopper before sending a notification.
admin/settings.marketplace-to-notify-hel: Allows a seller account to specify a comma separated list of marketplace account names to notify of inventory updates.
admin/settings.label: Settings
